column4: i have a question: it's not for me , i'm helping someone but he doesn't speak english: right after GDM a brown screen appears...and nothing else...what could be the problem?
i could translate if somebody would help out
usynic, ok he did ctrl alt f1 now what
ok he's doing it, (first time user)
ok i'll try he 's doing it
there is "Enter" between all that typing?
if he did things correctly he should have changed line 359 from SoundOnLogin=true to SoundOnLogin=false
if it's not so, do not type ":wq" but ":q!" and try all again
it says the file already exists?
sudo vi /etc/X11/gdm/gdm.conf asks for user password then shows a text file content
